epfl.lia.logist.security
Class SecurityManager

java.lang.Object
  epfl.lia.logist.security.SecurityManager

public class SecurityManager
extends java.lang.Object

The security manager is responsible for managing access to singleton resources. It checks access and denies to objects that are not listed in current policy.

          Default constructor of the class.

          Checks if current thread has access to resource
